name: Drinking in Season: Pumpkin and Apple Cider Cocktail
description: Apple cider plays the main role, but the addition of pumpkin purée provides a slightly thicker texture and hint of flavor, while vanilla vodka brings a warm, sweet undertone to the cocktail. A splash of spicy ginger ale livens this cocktail right up.
recipeIngredient: 1 1/2 ounces spicy ginger ale, such as Bruce Cost

recipeInstructions.text: In a cocktail shaker filled with ice, combine the pumpkin purée, vodka, and apple cider. Shake for 10-15 seconds.
Strain into a Collins glass filled with ice and top with ginger ale.
